00025         protected void doLogin(object sender, EventArgs e)
00026         {
00027 
00028             string password = pwd.Text.Trim();
00029             string email = loginEmail.Text.Trim();
00030 
00031             int userID = Security.Authenticate(email, password);
00032 
00033             IUserRepository userRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IUserRepository>();
00034             User userObj = userRepo.GetById(userID);
00035 
00036             if (userObj != null && (userObj.active == true) && userID > 0)
00037             {
00038                 Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID] = userID;
00039 
00040                 Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_NAME] = userObj.firstName;
00041 
00042                 Response.Redirect("customerView_Home.aspx");
00043             }

00045             {
00046                 messageLabel.Text = "Login information is not valid.";
